description.en:
NFT Art is powered by a deflationary utility-token NFTART and users of its platform will be able to stake NFTART token to claim or issue NFT’s.

They are setting out to become the easiest NFT platform to use by amongst other things implementing simple drag & drop solutions. First, releasing a web version and later apps for both Android & IOS.

The app will also enable the creation of NFT’s from phones.
